publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2667.1 Carolyn Leckie: Smoking, Health and Social Care (Scotland) Bill—As an amendment to motion (S2M-2667) in the name of Mr Andy Kerr, insert at end "but, in doing so, believes that the Scottish Executive’s pursuit of further privatisation in the form of joint ventures in section 31 of the Bill compromises the general benefits to health from the Bill and potentially undermines cross-party support for the passage of the Bill."
